_header: No god ne have thou buten one
_description: English verse translation of the Ten Commandments — six couplets

CamEmm27.First Lines:
No god ne haue þov boten onHys name þov naȝt an ydel
                    don…
CamEmm27.Last Lines:
…Iesu þat haueþ þes worlde i woldeþes ten
                    hestes us biddeþ holde
CamEmm27.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 129.
